post.desc:
A lot of interesting doujins out there showing how it was for Sanae to move to Gensokyo. One that I remember is how her mom "doesn't believe" anymore, but still kinda sent her off. I think it's a kimono? Actually, I think it's by azmaya (WaHH artist)... [**Eeeyup**](https://mangadex.org/title/26465a62-318d-4a32-9634-c2fb30995622/touhou-hare-no-hi-a-fine-day).

And there's also [**one**](https://mangadex.org/title/066efd8c-5fd3-4cfd-b70c-af5ea3c757a4/touhou-moriya-sama) from Zounose, but that's more on Kanako and Suwako – though I think the new works he made this year include what seems to be [**this topic**](https://x.com/zounose/status/1818956839478018072) too?

Correction: The end of the first paragraph should be "... in her room at her house in ██████"
